plot outline: Pappu (Krishnudu) is an average guy with an average look. Throughout his life his luck never favored him, which made him a pessimist. So when he fell in love with his boss's daughter, Radha (Deepika Parmar) he didn't even profess his love because of his pessimistic view on life. But later on when Radha gets kidnapped by some bad guys, he ends up going on a mission to rescue her. Will he be able rescue her and tell her how he really feels about her?
title: Pappu
plot: _Pappu_ (qv) (Krishnudu) is an average guy with an average look. Throughout his life his luck never favored him, which made him a pessimist. So when he fell in love with his boss's daughter, Radha (Deepika Parmar) he didn't even profess his love because of his pessimistic view on life. But later on when Radha gets kidnapped by some bad guys, he ends up going on a mission to rescue her. Will he be able rescue her and tell her how he really feels about her?::Niaz Islam Arif
